DOC.brief_summary: This phase 3 study serve collect efficacy safety data two different dos NT 201 subject suffer Bilateral Blephorasm ( BEB ) BTX treatment-naïve . In study , BTX treatment-naïve subject define receive BTX treatment within last 12 month treatment BEB . This definition aim avoid bias comparison treatment effect subject 's assessment . Furthermore , study substantiate exist efficacy safety database indication BEB .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Botulinum Toxin Type A Against Placebo Treat Abnormal Contraction Twitch Eyelid
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects receive one injection NT 201 placebo baseline placebo-controlled first cycle . Thereafter , subject enter Open-Label Extension Period ( OLEX ) receive second injection NT 201 ( second injection cycle ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient age ≥ 18 ≤ 80 year . A clinical diagnosis bilateral BEB characterize spontaneous , spasmodic , intermittent persistent involuntary contraction orbicular oculi muscle . A need injection BTX define Jankovic Rating Scale [ JRS ] severity subscore ≥ 2 . Treatmentnaïve subject define least 12 month without BTX serotype treatment BEB administration IP . Subject previous unsuccessful treatment BTX serotype treatment BEB . Atypical variant BEB ( e.g. , apraxia eyelid opening ) cause inhibition levator palpebrae muscle . Neurolepticinduced blepharospasm . Myotomy denervation surgery affect muscle ( e.g. , peripheral denervation , spinal cord stimulation ) surgery upper face . Generalized disorder muscle activity ( e.g. , myasthenia gravis particular ocularis , LambertEatonSyndrome , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis ) significant neuromuscular dysfunction might interfere study .
